definitions.definition: A male ant , bee , or wasp , which does not work but can fertilize the queen .
( now rare ) One who does not work ; a lazy person, an idler .
One who performs menial or tedious work.

subdefinitions.definition: An aircraft operated by remote control , especially an unmanned aerial vehicle ( UAV ).
examples: Several images of the compound were obtained via a drone overflight.
One team member launched a camera drone over the Third Pole.

subdefinitions.definition: ( chiefly military ) Any remotely-operated vehicle ( ROV ), especially when multiple such vehicles are operated from a larger vessel.

definitions.definition: ( Uganda ) A Toyota HiAce or a similar van , especially one used by Ugandan state agents to kidnap opposition members.
( slang , derogatory ) One who lacks the ability to think critically and independently , especially one who follows a group blindly ; a non-player character .

( BDSM ) In dronification kink, one who is mindless and obedient to a dominant , characterized by a detached and robotic identity and an anonymous appearance, typically composed of a latex suit and gas mask .

main_definition: A male ant , bee , or wasp , which does not work but can fertilize the queen .
secondary_definitions: ( now rare ) One who does not work ; a lazy person, an idler .
One who performs menial or tedious work.
( Uganda ) A Toyota HiAce or a similar van , especially one used by Ugandan state agents to kidnap opposition members.
( slang , derogatory ) One who lacks the ability to think critically and independently , especially one who follows a group blindly ; a non-player character .

( BDSM ) In dronification kink, one who is mindless and obedient to a dominant , characterized by a detached and robotic identity and an anonymous appearance, typically composed of a latex suit and gas mask .

definitions.definition: ( music ) One of the fixed-pitch pipes on a bagpipe .
( music , uncountable ) A genre of music that uses repeated lengthy droning sounds.
A humming or deep murmuring sound.

secondary_definitions: ( music ) One of the fixed-pitch pipes on a bagpipe .
( music , uncountable ) A genre of music that uses repeated lengthy droning sounds.
A humming or deep murmuring sound.
